fields.description: The mask which employee number will begin with, e.g: EMP-0001, the part 'EMP-' is  Employee Mask
fields.label: Employee Mask

fields.description: The number which employee number will begin with, e.g: EMP-0001, the part '0001' is  Employee Number Mask and  begin numbering from 1
fields.label: Employee Number Mask

fields.description: After this time, a Late application will be sent auto to the manager
fields.label: Morning Delay In Minutes

fields.description: Before this time, Early departure application will be sent auto to the manager
fields.label: Early departure In Minutes

fields.description: After this time, Footprint Clock will be closed, and you can not make attendance
fields.label: Footprint Clock Closing

fields.label: Departure Clock Closing

fields.label: Run Absent Script

fields.label: Bonus Children
